title: Multitasking In Java, Part 1: Multithreading
firstParagraph: The more I learn about Java, the more I am impressed by the extent of its capabilities. It is deeply robust, a product both of its design and its maturity. It may not be the most dexterous language, and it is undeniably verbose compared to Ruby or Python. But I can see why it continues to be ranked as the most popular programming language in the world (and has been since the 90's).
